website_summaries.verdict: One of the best all-terrain hoverboards available for purchase, this durable product is sure to impress.
pros: Battery lasts up to 1 hour or 10 miles with a single charge
Great for steep hills and all-terrain riding
Offers larger foot pad than most hoverboards
cons: Customer service could be more responsive
Not the best option for bigger adults

customer_reviews.title: Was ridden about 2-3 hours by a 65 pound child ...
customer_reviews.text: Was ridden about 2-3 hours by a 65 pound child and the board completely broke apart in the middle. Only five weeks old into a 12 month warranty EPIKGO has been very unresponsive with the warranty claim. Do Not Buy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy from Power-innovation for prompt courteous customer service!
customer_reviews.text: When our power supply broke upon usage, the manufacturer was useless. We could have shipped this super heavy item back to Amazon but what a waste. When we contacted Power-innovation, they immediately shipped out a replacement and return label. I'm super pleased with their prompt and courteous service! As for the hoverboard itself, it's a beefy powerful board! It makes "normal" hoverboards look like toys in comparison! It can go offload (assuming you're great at balance) and has plenty of power to spare! The whole family loves it, and are now constantly asking to "borrow" it from my 12-yr-old who is only off it when it's charging!
customer_reviews.author: Trenton B Tuggle

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 11 year old son and he ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old son and he loves it. VERY durable. It is a little on the heavy side, but it is a winner. He picked up on it very quickly. 8 months later and this hoover board is still going strong... my son still loves it and it has proven to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: April C.

customer_reviews.title: It was great for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son was the only person to ride this. It was great for 3 months. He used it on our driveway and sidewalk. It broke right in half down the middle one day. That was $200 a month for this toy. What a joke!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: Want 1 for myself
customer_reviews.text: Great product, have had so much fun with my kids since Christmas. Way more than I expected!!!!!! Well, this was before 1 of them broke after 1 week of use, the aluminum alloy frame broke. Initiated a return on January 3, received a replacement on January 31. Customer service sucks, email only, no phone #. It was covered under warranty so no issue with that, things do break due to defects, no problem with that, it should not take 4 weeks however. If this holds up and nothing else happens, then my opinion may change.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for good hoverboard this might be the one for you
customer_reviews.text: Says it off road but have hard time on some none blacktop smooth surfaces such as grass and gravel but maybe I just need to get use too it. I give it 4 stars for some off roading. Not bad product for my first hover board. I end up returning it because I didnt use it as much as I thought I would have
customer_reviews.author: Dew841

customer_reviews.title: handles hills easily and it has been a family favorite
customer_reviews.text: This board travels everywhere, handles hills easily and it has been a family favorite 10/23/17 We purchased this almost a year ago....still a wonderful purchase. My daughter had an accident and damaged the product, she contacted the company and the customer service has been above and beyond amazing. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: We purchased 2 of these. One works perfectly, ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these. One works perfectly, the second repeatedly stops unexpectedly (even tho fully charged), flinging my son into the pavement/grass. There is no beeping to say it's low on its charge, just immediately stops. Very dangerous if riding this at full speed. Giving 5 stars for the one that works and -3 for the one that could have seriously injured my son.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: The off road capabilities are cool, but drains battery quicker
customer_reviews.text: This hover board exceeded my expectations. Handles bumps in the road/sidewalks with ease. The off road capabilities are cool, but drains battery quicker. The only bad thing about this, is it's weight. The battery died on me a 1/2 mile away from destination, and carrying it was horrible. Even with the weight issue, this board is super fun to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used and broken hover board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Amazon recommended hoverboard for my daughter for Christmas! She opened it Christmas morning to find dog poop on the wheels, scratches and deep under carriage damage to this hover board. We plugged it in and it would not even charge to give a ride to see if we even wanted to purchase another one. This was suppose to be a brand new unit. What a big diss appointment for my 10 year old daughter in Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: shannon christianson

customer_reviews.title: Best Hover board on the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! I had bought two different types of a different brand and had to send them back. We finally tried the EPIKGO brand and could not be more happier. What a very durable rugged hover board! I can't say enough about how well it was designed. My children love it! I never was able to ride the other ones due to the weigh limit and this product allows adult to learn to ride. I was impressed at how good it rode in the grass and it some areas of sand here in Florida. Definitely would buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kaliher

customer_reviews.title: Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for almost 3 years with moderate use and it works like a charm with no issues, however, in my 3rd year it appears the casing around the plug is broken off. DIY is probably a better fix, however, I purchased a warranty at the time so I will now hopefully see if the warranty works. Other than that the device has been great!
customer_reviews.author: Android User

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic to use on a paved/flat surface. Works well enough in rougher terrain such as grass and gravel. Not that I would recommend using this at night but it does have lights up front to show the path. Kids ages 9 - 52 have enjoyed it for over thirty days now.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Worked for one day and quit
customer_reviews.text: Was great until the second day. The board just quit Like something was loose inside and the error light wouldn’t go away. I’ve tried the reset process over and over with no luck. Customer service from epikgo was useless. I just sent it back to amazon for a refund. Big disappointment for a pretty expensive board.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Leman

customer_reviews.title: Skip it to a better brand!
customer_reviews.text: I personally don t recommend it to anyone! I had problems with battery and some missing parts and the seller never answer me back poor costumer service!
customer_reviews.author: Gennaro

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this hover scooter in January 9 and have ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hover scooter in January 9 and have used it only a few times. Now I can't get it to work, it turns on, blinks and turns off and there is no return information to help me resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Symington

customer_reviews.title: Be the cool kid in the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.text: Great hover board. Seems pretty durable, and able to support my weight. (230lb) Takes a little bit getting used to, but once you got it, its a blast to ride. Only design change I would suggest would be to shorten the wheel guards so that when you have to bail, they don't smash on the ground causing the board to flip.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.

customer_reviews.title: Owned for two weeks and wont detect weight now.
customer_reviews.text: This product was fun to ride around the neighborhood with my kids. It had long lasting charges. Unfortunately I have only owned this for two weeks and it won't detect weight now. I feel like I have lite almost $500 on fire. Super mad. Do not buy this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aleisha

customer_reviews.title: Epikgo Self Balancing Board
customer_reviews.text: Great board! Fun and easy to ride once you get the hang of it! Off road wheels make for a great time off-road as well as on the road! I really enjoy this board. Just a heads up. It's better to ride with tennie shoes on than with boots. My weight distribution while wearing boots has gotten me thrown off twice. Other than that no problems. Great machine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THEY LOVE THEM! Really durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 - one for my 11 yo and one for my 8 yo. THEY LOVE THEM! Really durable! (And yes, let them ride them in the house. But I don't care - keeps them up and active.) It's been 3 months now and they still ride them - EVERY DAY! My little guy will even have "shows" that he will do dance moves on them. #Priceless My husband thought I was nuts paying $500 per scooter, but I truly believe we have gotten our money's worth!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, durable Hoover board with great features!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He rarely charges it because the batteries last so long. I was worried at first but the self-stabilizing feature works great! He can ride it off-pavement with no lag. Also, the built-in blue-tooth speakers are a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Artopia

customer_reviews.title: THIS ITEM IS NOT WORTH PURCHASING
customer_reviews.text: Have got little to no use out of this. Started to crack in the center of the unit right from day one. Paid all the extra money for this because of ratings. WISH I HAD DONE MORE RESEARCH
customer_reviews.author: Larry Childress

customer_reviews.title: World's best hoverboard!!! Thoroughly enjoying it.
customer_reviews.text: It's well built and very strong. The lights are awesome. It holds charge for a long time and has excellent top speed. It can climb small hills. The tires are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyan Chakraborty

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy and fun for our whole family
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son. He loves it we have a lot of hills it's no problem for this board. Nice and sturdy and fun for our whole family. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Read2much

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but longer battery please!
customer_reviews.text: Solid as Rock and still going strong for a 220LB male who abuses it everyday. I wish it can last longer because I hate to carry it back by hand back to my car after using it for one hour at the Pier.
customer_reviews.author: TechGuy

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my Grand-daughter and after months of her amazing me with her expertise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Grand-daughter and after months of her amazing me with her expertise, joy and the product holding up after many tough rides, I would purchase again and again. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Hawke 34

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Company very slow to respond
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 7 days. Very disappointed. Company very slow to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and performing better than expected. It is able to run uphill at a reasonable speed. My son rides this all over the house too. He is able to turn around in small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Hall

customer_reviews.title: This Hoverboard is awesome. It is well made
customer_reviews.text: This Hoverboard is awesome. It is well made, (a little heavy actually) it easily runs in the grass, on sand and on gravel. My 13 year old loves it! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome board, great battery life and fast charging. Performs like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bright lights, and works great outside on dirt.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Alternative travel
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my college junior son. It’s as attached to him as his cell phone
customer_reviews.author: David Addley

customer_reviews.title: Inflatable tires would have softened the ride
customer_reviews.text: Well built I am really enjoying the fearful thrill, maybe I'm just a thrill junkie I've ridden it all over town I have had two falls, both my fault, and now am wearing some protection Too bad it didn't have inflatable tires as you can feel every bump on the road Many looks comments and stare are generated by this board I was going to return it as it had problem initially, they seem to have corrected themselves and now the board is working as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Son of the Most high

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hoverboard!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. He absolutely loves it! It is fast charging, very easy to ride, looks SUPER cool, and has provided hours of entertainment as well as exercise. If he would only stop riding it in the house :(
customer_reviews.author: Lori Robertson

customer_reviews.title: This board is, in fact, EPIC!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best board on the market! It's fast and can run over anything. We bought it for a Christmas present for our boys (10 and 13) and they love it. I can ride it too and at 200 lbs it runs just as fast with me as it does them. If you're going to buy one, this is worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Morgan

customer_reviews.title: she loved it, seems to be very well bult
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 10 year old daughter for Christmas, she loved it, seems to be very well bult, great tires, long run times, it even haul my big but around with ease, 240 lbs...highly recommend, wished it was a little less expensive but completely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Robert J knutson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My 9yo son loves it! SO MUCH better than his regular hover board with standard size wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Great hover board. Rugged, well designed, high quality material and workmanship. You certainly get what you pay for. My kids have put miles on it in the house, outside in yard and in street. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: RadXpert

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty board
customer_reviews.text: Great fun! This is a heavy duty board my daughter and husband just love it. Have only logged about 12 hours of riding on it so far (all off road) but I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: huck

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great hover board! My daughter loves it and uses it every chance she gets. Great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Gustavo's Epikgo hoverboard!
customer_reviews.text: My son is eight years old he is in a phase that spends a lot of energy the epikgo has come to bring him moments of great joy Epikgo is super tough runs on the grass and on the asphalt with a lot of speed is a great acquisition for a child who Have a lot of energy to spend we are super satisfied with the epikgo
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: The epikgo self balancing scooter is awesome. It rides really well and it is very ...
customer_reviews.text: The epikgo self balancing scooter is awesome. It rides really well and it is very strong. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and good quality unlike the cheap ones others sell!!
customer_reviews.author: timothy ekpo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Well made, sturdy and fun to ride! It's well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Cook

customer_reviews.title: This product is great! It is very durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! It is very durable and sturdy! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mattern

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new hover board. Great product. Priced higher then other hover boards but well worth the money. Great customer service!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: ... after we use it I don't know is it bad quality or bad luck because the product is really ...
customer_reviews.text: Well from day one the left side lighting is half lighter no matter what the charging level is full Second issue the power puch bottom was found broken on the floor a week after we use it I don't know is it bad quality or bad luck because the product is really expinsive and i expected to be good
customer_reviews.author: Nermin

customer_reviews.title: Solid and stable
customer_reviews.text: solid stable product, greatly enjoyed by my son as birthday present. The larger tires size compared to base models ideal for our community with occasional sandy and bumpy streets. Surprisingly great on grass and hills. Lights, front and rear, are cool and functional. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: WOW, this hoverboard is a complete blast. I ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW, this hoverboard is a complete blast. I have only had it a few days but this thing is very well constructed compared to some of the other boards out there. I hope this board lasts me quite a long time, I will definitely follow up on my thoughts on this product as I get to use it more. For now, totally loving this hoverboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We live in the woods and it is perfect for the terrain
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in the family uses it. We live in the woods and it is perfect for the terrain. Great for doing housework too!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Easy to ride and a lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought the EPIKGO for my 6 year for Christmas. She loves it. Easy to ride and a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Marks

customer_reviews.title: Its amazing because where I live is unflat and we don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Its amazing because where I live is unflat and we don't have a paved driveway so the all terrain really helped!!!
customer_reviews.author: Duane Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hoverboard you can buy IMO, and I've owned at least 4 different models.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sarchet

customer_reviews.title: We've only had it less then a week, but ...
customer_reviews.text: We've only had it less then a week, but it seems rugged and is quick. My son loves it. Received for his 7th birthday and he is 62 lbs...no issues at all riding it. Much heavier then expected though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it this hover board is the best in the world
customer_reviews.author: Mali stunna

customer_reviews.title: The EPIKGO Self Balancing Scooter is Great, Had other ones but this is by far ...
customer_reviews.text: The EPIKGO Self Balancing Scooter is Great, Had other ones but this is by far the best for balance and off roading!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J. Viselle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how heavy it was but it has proven to be a great purchase so far. It's built sturdy. So far...my son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She is the envy of the neighborhood
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great device, great ride and easy to communicate with company
customer_reviews.text: This device is much more versatile than the first generation that is limited to smooth surfaces. Tons of fun with only a little practice. Kids without fear learn instantly. This is a U.S. company that is very easy to deal with...good customer service. My first device was damaged in shipping and they were eager to replace it and get a good one to me. I was slow to return the damaged one but they did not hold it against me or use it as an excuse to hold back a replacement. All in, very happy with the device and the sellers.
customer_reviews.author: T. Burdette

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the first half of the first charge
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first half of the first charge. Then light indicator said it was over heating. Sent it back. Paid $706.00. Used it indoors for approximately 45 min. Only reimbursed me $ 565.00 back. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Blane n.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son has enjoyed riding this. Great battery time and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dishner

customer_reviews.title: Future is HERE🤗🤗!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very impressive way to relocate yourself in a city of issaguah 👍😃
customer_reviews.author: Marian wasilewski

customer_reviews.title: EPIKGO powerful and responsive
customer_reviews.text: Operates very well on smooth pavement or hard packed dirt. Still learning how to keep balance on uneven surfaces. Certainly suggest protective gear, I bought wrist guards but one might also consider knee pads.
customer_reviews.author: jim kress

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best self balancing scooter on the markets. I test it on small stones, grass etc. it goes everywhere. The quality is really one of the best i ever saw (got 4)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Solid board quality but non existent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The board quality is solid and I've had no significant issues with it after limited use. However the customer service is unresponsive. Firstly they recommend that you email them for warranty purposes but after 5 emails with the warranty information as well as some genuine questions, I still have yet to hear back. No telephone number is provided for direct contact either. Definitely expect better customer service from a uS based company, especially given the premium pricing.
customer_reviews.author: EvilP

customer_reviews.title: I'm quite pleased. It is a little shakey getting started when ...
customer_reviews.text: It really should have all five stars but I had hoped that it had a "handle" available for overcoming the learning curve. Might save a few bruises. Other than that, I'm quite pleased. It is a little shakey getting started when you're 75 years old. Corky Richmond, Tx
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 8 year old Great Grand Daughter for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 53 pound, 8 year old Great Grand Daughter for Christmas. She loves it. Very easy to ride. She was not to lite to ride it and has not had any problems. Well made product.
customer_reviews.author: lg2

customer_reviews.title: Industry Standard
customer_reviews.text: Great product; long battery life, intuitive learning curve, durable, and powerful. I have seen other makes/models in our neighborhood and believe EPIKGO has set the industry standard for hoverboards. The 1yr warranty is average and the product cost is on the steep end; however, if you're on the fence for purchasing this product, it is my opinion that you get what you pay for and with this hoverboard you get the full package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: mine broke so will try to get it replaced and then I will be able to rate it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 months and was never used outside the house!! Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish!! I purchased this EPIKGO self Balancing scooter for my 11 yr old son for Christmas, its been indoors ever since. Took its out today for the first time and one of the foot pads won't work. Cant ride it. Waste of money!! Want to return it
customer_reviews.author: Keith Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Cannot purchase the parts.
customer_reviews.text: After 3months, one of the wheel is water damaged. I know it is not submersible. But It couldn't handle rain and puddles. I asked them to sell the wheel because I can replace it. But they just cannot sell 'parts'. That means you cannot replace the tire. You need to ship the whole hoverboard to them and they will 'fix' it for you.
customer_reviews.author: guem wook lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent high quality product and outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: After researching multiple Hover Boards I decided to get the EPIKGO and I was not disappointed. Both the product as well as the customer service from the company are outstanding. The company stands behind their products. My kids have been riding these hover boards since November and they have performed flawlessly even after multiple falls and bumps. It is definitely a rugged well built machine that I would recommend to anyone interested in purchasing a hover board
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Superior Durability!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 10-year old daughter who had be begging for a "hover board" for over a year. The Epikgo is much more sturdy and durable in every respect than any of the others that I have seen, and my daughter is enjoying riding it outside now that the weather has started to warm. I've been impressed with the amount of information that the manufacturer has provided me with ever since I placed the order.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Fenomenal
customer_reviews.text: Have had for one month and have had no problems. The shaking I've heard about in other reviews has to do with underweight people riding it. Would strongly recommend for anyone over 60 pounds!
customer_reviews.author: Yasuo Hasakee

customer_reviews.title: In one of the hoover boards I received the rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: In one of the hoover boards I received the rubber bumpers-the other is missing.the rubber sides fall off and don't stay on. Need to consider something different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too good too be true
customer_reviews.text: Zero customer support. TWO boards bought for 9yr old boys have broken frames within weeks of use. 2 stars bc before they broke in half they were pretty darn cool.
customer_reviews.author: Showtan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: had trouble with first one but was replaced with no problem very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: speed

customer_reviews.title: I do wish that it had some features like Bluetooth speakers built into
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing two other brands I must say that this one is definitely more durable. I do wish that it had some features like Bluetooth speakers built into it
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Fun to have it
customer_reviews.text: In process of returning it. Fun to have it! This piece start making click noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 2 after lest then 1h. I send ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice bord, my son (11 year old) learn how to used it in less then 5min. Sevice #1
customer_reviews.author: Kayle

customer_reviews.title: Great all-terrain board!
customer_reviews.text: Great board...the all-terrain tires are one of the best features. Also, easily connects to Bluetooth and alerts you when powered on/off. Customer Service was very helpful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ted V

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! We've all ridden it around but he loves the fact that he can take it through the grass and over bumps
customer_reviews.author: KD Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: This hover board is second to none, it's top shelf!! Very well built! Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Don Cary

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Service & GREAT Product!
customer_reviews.text: My original scooter had an issue with charging. The manufacturer called me up and replaced the unit in a timely fashion. My son loves it and is very happy with the product so far. I highly recommend one of these scooters from EPIKGO!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ray F.

customer_reviews.title: Truly Epic
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction and works as advertised. Handles the hills and dirt roads in my neighborhood with no problems. Also easy to ride. My 12 yr old daughter was riding this like a pro in 15 minutes. Very satisfied. Considering buying another one for the family for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Goes over many terrains
customer_reviews.text: So far so good but I can't seem to ride it for more than about 10 minutes until my feet hurt. Maybe I just need to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Samson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. We bought 8 of these as Christmas presents and
customer_reviews.author: Walk

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS HOVERBOARD ANY OTHER IS WASTE OF YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: So much better the other hoverboard I had a different kind before I bought this one and the tire got a flat this one that will never happen. Excellent quality I use it to push my wheelchair bond son around the neighborhood it's much or powerful and the bigger foot plates make it easier to control can't go wrong with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: not built for full size adult.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy but did not work for me. A full size adult it moves on flat surface a few mph but even on slight hill no go. For kids or teens it would be much better. Small adults also. One caution the faster you go the more sensitive you staying on when you hit a dip in the road. Even at slower speed it threw me at a dip. It is a lot of fun overall and even i could figure it out with minimal effort. I wish it had been more powerful. I returned it since i couldn't go on my street. In the house i really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: keith scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Will give as a birthday gift in January let you know
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 star for lying. This made in CHINA not ...
customer_reviews.text: 1 star for lying. This made in CHINA not in the US. I wouldn't pay $600 for a china junk.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Le

product_meta.title: EPIKGO Self Balancing Scooter Hover Self-Balance Board - UL2272 Certified, All-Terrain 8.5” Alloy Wheel, 400W Dual-Motor, LG Battery, Board Hover Tough Road Condition [Classic Series, Space Grey]
product_meta.description:
Introducing EPIKGO Classic Self Balance Board

EPIKGO is far from average, it's the next generation of electrical self-balancing board technology. Recently the hover balance board industry took the world by storm as it showed a new innovative form of transportation. Unfortunately, this new wave of technology came with a few issues of its own. EPIKGO recognized the problems and safety concerns in the industry and corrected them to develop the transportation of tomorrow for the generation of today. 

The EPIKGO has obtained the highest standard in regards to safety after successfully becoming UL 2272 Certified; assuring users that fire and electrical hazards are not a factor. Besides being safer, EPIKGO stands out because its durable build helps it tackle virtually any obstacle in its way. Travel through grass, mud, dirt and sand with this new device built to go anywhere and do more.
feature_bullets: GO SAFER - UL 2272 Certified balance board with UL2271 Certified Smart Battery. Underwent and passed 159 tests regarding safety regulations, meaning no potential fire hazards. Recommend at the Age 13+

MORE POWER - EPIKGO has 400W Dual Motors that help it climb slopes as steep as 18 degree and last over 1 hour and over 10mile range on a single charge, making it the most powerful balance board on the market.
GO ANYWHERE - Solid rubber tires for all- terrain purposes. Rated IP56 for solidness and water resistance. Easily maneuver through grass, mud and sand on the board built to do more.
BIGER & BETTER - EPIKGO is nearly 2x more powerful and 30% larger than the leading competitor meaning more foot space, a more stable ride and more control.
Maximum weight limit- 240 pounds. Minimum weight limit- 44 pounds
Plus the built-in fast 2 hour fast charging technology, it makes the most sophisticated product of its kind.
